name: Purple 6 by Espinosa & Fernandez
additionalNotes:
"Erik Espinosa, a cigar industry stalwart, cut his teeth as a broker for titans like Rocky Patel and Drew Estate, before venturing into his own cigar-making odyssey. In 2004, Espinosa co-founded EO Brands, sharpening his blend mastery, which paved the way to his solo venture, Espinosa Cigars, in Esteli’s La Zona Factory. Known for his devotion to quality, Espinosa crafts cigars that sing with Nicaraguan tobacco, delivering a medium-full orchestra of cocoa, cedar, spice, and pepper.

What unfolds when AJ Fernandez crafts one of his priciest stogies for Espinosa, and a band mishap leads to Privada landing a goldmine? A delicious blunder. This under-the-radar gem isn’t your typical high-ticket Espinosa release—heck, Espinosa’s probably fuming. So’s AJ. But here’s the scoop: we get to cradle these beauties into our humidor."
https://privadacigarclub.com/product/purple-6/
